reviewText:
I am a lesbian looking for a fun and titilating movie that my partner and I can watch. There is so little out there for genuine lesbian sexy movies - so I gave this one a try. Very disappointing to say the least... The woman doing the massage has no passion or genuine interest in arousing her subject. And the subject seemed like she was playing the part of enjoying it. The actresses seemed like they were from overseas - maybe eastern Europe?

We didn't make it through more than 30 minutes but during that time the camera seemed to focus a lot on massage of the subject's feet. And her feet could have used a serious pedicure - not attractive! The subject also seemed to have a lot of blemishes/bruises on her body. Very disconcerting - not sexy. Both actresses had crooked teeth. All these things together dampened any possible chance of arousal in what sounded like it could be a good setup. Save your money and don't bother with this one...
meh. I am a Claire fan and this video while showing her fine points does not display her engaging personality.

The Model is very cute, but the masseuse is not a professional at all (she as amateurish massage techniques only). But most disappointing is the quality of the video: it is not full HD 1080p or 720p that for certain. It is more like 720x480.

David is The Man...Always knows where to find the top talent, and I know no one will disagree that Claire is the star. I only had to see a few seconds of the massage blu-ray to convince me that I had to buy any blu-ray where she appeared. And there's more Claire to be seen, but it's too overwhelmingly hot to be sold on Amazon, so you have to visit the DavidNudesWorld website.
Every dvd/blu-ray he offers on Amazon is more than worth the price, and the blu-rays get you a full color advert for the websites. If you're lucky, you'll get the advert that's actually a mini-poster of Claire's 'talents'.
She's very addictive, and it's the kind of addiction that shouldn't be cured.
All of the dvd/blu-rays are spectacular, but Claire will always be the one who drew me in.

And for those who complain about not getting a traditional plastic case for the disc, get over it...stop whining. The paper disc sleeve and thicker paper packaging provide more than enough protection from damage.
Honestly, guys....when have you ever had the opportunity to see true beauty at such a low price?
This DVD failed to hold my attention. Many of the shots were repeated over and over again.
Lots of closeups. Claire is perfect.great quality, would highly recommend, very pleased. Going to try more of these, movies in the foture.
